heading: Amended construction documents
text:
Subject to the time limitations set forth in this code, amendments to approved
construction documents shall be submitted, reviewed and approved before the work or equipment is completed; and such
amendments when approved shall be deemed part of the original construction documents. The department may allow minor
revisions of construction documents to be made and submitted to the department after the completion of work but prior to sign-off
of the work in accordance with department rules.
